title: Dagon'hai robes

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dagon'hai robes are a set of magic robes worn by members of the Dagon'hai, an ancient Zamorakian organisation. Obtained from Larran's big chest at a rate of 1/256 per piece, they require level 70 Magic and 40 Defence to wear. It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dagon'hai robes
A player wearing Dagon'hai robes.

Dagon'hai robes are a set of magic robes worn by members of the Dagon'hai, an ancient Zamorakian organisation. Obtained from Larran's big chest at a rate of 1/256 per piece, they require level 70 Magic and 40 Defence to wear. It can be stored in a magic wardrobe in a player owned house.

These robes are Zamorak affiliated items, including when worn in the God Wars Dungeon.

Contents

  • 1 Components
  • 2 Bonuses
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Development history
  • 5 Changes

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 May 2021
(update)

Dagon-hai robes are now correctly listed as members-only items in the Defence skill-guide.

Development history[edit | edit source]

 This section contains information on content that did not pass a poll.
As such, the information presented here does not pertain to the live game, and is preserved for archival.

Dagon'hai robes were originally proposed alongside the Warding skill. In the original proposal, players would have been able to ward the robes with level 65 Warding using chaos silk. The stats for the robes were also higher than the version that was eventually repolled and released. The original stats are shown below.

Item Attack Bonuses Defence Bonuses Other
Dagon'hai hat 0 0 0 +7 0 0 0 0 +7 0 0 0 0% +2
Dagon'hai robe top 0 0 0 +32 0 0 0 0 +28 0 0 0 0% +2
Dagon'hai robe bottom 0 0 0 +24 0 0 0 0 +20 0 0 0 0% +2
Totals 0 0 0 +63 0 0 0 0 +55 0 0 0 0% +6

(update)

Dagonâ€™hai garments are now recognised as Zamorakian items.
